overview: In a fancy restaurant, five businesswoman, every each of them more neurotic than the other, decide to celebrate a banquet to raise some money for the poor children in Africa. They try hard to keep their manners, acting as if none of them had any problem with the other but they actually hate each other. As the evening goes on, these women will realize that no one is save from the prejudices of our society. Racism, homophobia and quite many other inequalities, are dishes that will be tasted for all those guests that dare to assist to the benefit event of the year.
title: Tribu
